```{r plotcats}
totals <<- training_transactions %>% group_by(level_1_category) %>% summarise(cat_total = sum(dollars_obligated)) %>% collect()
total_strings <- totals %>% mutate(dollar_totals = to_currency(cat_total, currency_symbol = "$", symbol_first = TRUE, group_size = 3, group_delim = ",", decimal_size = 2,decimal_delim = ".")) %>% collect()                                                                                                     

total_strings %>% filter(is.na(level_1_category) == FALSE)%>%
    ggplot(aes(x=as.factor(level_1_category), y=cat_total, label = dollar_totals) ) + 
    geom_col() +geom_text(angle=90, color = "orange", size = 3, position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5))+
    theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(angle=90, vjust=0.5, size=10))
```
## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r getaddressability}
oasis_addressablility_matrix <- dplyr_gen_addressability_matrix_df("OASIS", training_transactions)
oasis_result_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(oasis_addressablility_matrix, testing_transactions)
oasis_addressablility_result <- oasis_result_df %>% select(dollars_obligated)%>% sum()
oasis_addressablility_result_formatted <- to_currency(oasis_addressablility_result, currency_symbol = "$", symbol_first = TRUE, group_size = 3, group_delim = ",", decimal_size = 2,decimal_delim = ".")
print(paste0("OASIS addressable spend is : ", oasis_addressablility_result_formatted))
```
